mapper.insert: insert ignore into bci_application (paradigm_id, team_id, update_user) values (#{application.paradigmId}, #{application.teamId}, #{application.updateUser})
mapper.select: select id, team_name, university from bci_team where event_id = #{event} and team_name like CONCAT('%', #{teamName}, '%') and status = 0 limit #{index}, #{pageSize}

select t.id, t.team_name, t.university, t.instructor from bci_team t join bci_application a on t.id = a.team_id where t.event_id = #{event} and a.status = 0 and a.paradigm_id = #{paradigm} and t.status = 0
select team_id from bci_application where paradigm_id = #{paradigm} and status = 1
